response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a symbol of excellence and a testament to its craftsmanship. Given its significance to me, I am offering it to you at a special price tailored to reflect its true worth and your appreciation for it. My proposal is to offer the product to you for $1,200,000. This price is carefully calculated to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing my return on investment. I believe this offer presents a compelling proposition, allowing you to secure a piece of exceptional quality at a price that is advantageous compared to market standards. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring whether this product aligns with your needs and aspirations. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you every step of the way.", "product_price": 1200000}
